name: protean

effect.x-y: Changes the bearer's type to match each move it uses. The type change takes place just before the move is used.
effect.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: Changes the bearer's type to match each move it uses. The type change takes place just before the move is used.

short_effect: Changes the bearer's type to match each move it uses.

flavor_text.x-y: Changes the Pokémon’s type to the type of the move it’s using.
flavor_text.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: Changes the Pokémon’s type to the type of the move it’s using.
